news.headline: KK MINER launches mobile app for free cloud mining of Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin. App offers $10 signup bonus, $1 daily login reward. Top-tier security, diverse contract options, 100% uptime assured. Experts predict Bitcoin at $150,000, Litecoin at $1,000.
news.summary: KK MINER, a UK-regulated cloud mining leader, has launched a mobile app allowing users to manage their Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin mining investments on-the-go. The app offers seamless monitoring, enhanced security with McAfee® and Cloudflare®, and instant rewards such as a $10 sign-up bonus and $1 daily for logging in. Users can choose diverse contract options starting from $10, ensuring 24/7 access to mining operations. With experts predicting Bitcoin to reach $150,000 and Litecoin $1,000, KK MINER aims to democratize cryptocurrency mining.

news.headline: Trump's support for Bitcoin Reserve Act aims to establish a Bitcoin Reserve to counter the national debt nearing $36 trillion. SEC Chairman Gensler, known for prosecuting crypto projects, is no longer in charge. Bitcoin price surged by 40% after Trump's election. Senator Cynthia Lummis introduced the Bitcoin Reserve Act to sell gold certificates, buy Bitcoin, and hold it for 20 years. Trump and Melania launched NFTs and endorsed a DeFi platform called World Liberty Financial. Holding Bitcoin can help pay down national debt and diversify investments. Investors are turning to Bitcoin as an alternative to traditional stocks and bonds.
news.summary: President Trump is supporting the Bitcoin Reserve Act, expected to pass through the Senate in his second term. Former SEC Chairman Gensler, known for pursuing unregistered crypto projects, is no longer in charge. Trump's election led to a 40% rise in Bitcoin's price, with promises of a Bitcoin Reserve. Senator Lummis introduced the Act to have the US Treasury buy Bitcoin using gold certificates. Trump and First Lady Melania have launched their NFTs, and endorse World Liberty Financial, a DeFi platform. With the national debt at $36 trillion, an increase in Bitcoin's value could assist in reducing it. Holding Bitcoin offers anonymity through a unique alphanumeric key. Investors use Bitcoin for portfolio diversification, given its 24/7 trading availability.

Capri Holdings' revenue declined 11.6% in Q3 FY2025 to $0.45 earnings per share, with an operating margin of 6.0%.
news.summary: In London, Capri Holdings Limited (NYSE:CPRI), a renowned global luxury fashion group, shared its financial outcomes for the third quarter of Fiscal 2025 concluding on December 28, 2024. The third quarter of Fiscal 2025 presented revenue downturns of 11.6% reported and 11.4% in constant currency, alongside an adjusted operating margin of 6.0%. Furthermore, adjusted earnings per share stood at $0.45. John D. Idol, the Chairman and CEO of the Company, expressed, "Overall, our business faced persistent challenges during this period."

Global Fertilizer & Agricultural Chemical Market set to grow at 5.7% CAGR, reaching $785.26 Billion by 2034, with North America market at $95.78 Billion in 2024 and East Asia market projected to expand at 7%. China expected to reach $95.34 Billion revenue by 2034.
news.summary: The global Fertilizer & Agricultural Chemical Market is projected to reach a valuation of US$ 452.66 billion in 2024 and is forecasted to grow to US$ 785.26 billion by 2034. Precision farming technologies are enabling the precise and efficient use of fertilizers and chemicals, reducing waste and costs by tailoring inputs to soil and crop needs. East Asia is expected to lead the market over the next decade due to a well-established agricultural sector and increasing food demand. North America is estimated to reach a market valuation of US$ 95.78 billion in 2024. The market in East Asia is forecasted to expand at a CAGR of 7% through 2034, with China's revenue from these products projected to reach US$ 95.34 billion by the end of the same year. The market is expected to grow at a 5.7% CAGR between 2024 and 2034.

news.headline: India's financial regulator fines Bybit $1M for non-compliance with prevention of money laundering, registration.
news.summary: Bybit, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, has been fined $1 million by India's financial regulator for its failure to register under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act. Consequently, the compliance status of Bybit remains uncertain.

Free operating cash flow also saw a significant increase to $57 million from $36 million in the previous year. Earnings per diluted share (EPS) stood at $0.23, with adjusted EPS at $0.25. In addition, around $31 million was returned to shareholders during this period.

news.headline: Plutus Financial Group IPO offers 2.1M shares at $4 each on NasdaqCM, raising $8.4 million. Trading as "PLUT" starting Feb 5.
news.summary: Hong Kong, Feb. 05, 2025 - Plutus Financial Group Limited, a financial services company based in Hong Kong, has announced the pricing of its IPO. The Offering consists of 2,100,000 ordinary shares priced at $4 per share, resulting in total gross proceeds of $8.4 million, not including underwriting discounts and offering expenses. The Offering is taking place on a firm commitment basis, with the ordinary shares set to start trading on the Nasdaq Capital Market under the symbol “PLUT” on February 5, 2025.

news.headline: US stock futures likely to open lower due to Alphabet and AMD earnings. Key indices declining with Russell 2000 up. Notable companies reporting earnings. Treasury yields at 4.47% and 4.19%. Fed to likely keep rates unchanged in March. Notable premarket trading decliner ETFs. Tech, Energy, Communication led gains, while Utilities and consumer staples declined. China retaliated, job openings and factory orders declined. Key index performance. BlackRock emphasizing AI investment implications.
news.summary: U.S. stock futures saw a decline post prior advances due to trade war worries and major earnings reports, with three benchmark indices dropping while the Russell 2000 saw a slight increase. Companies including Disney, Qualcomm, Uber, and TotalEnergies are set to report earnings. The 10-year Treasury yield stood at 4.47%, and the two-year yield at 4.19%, with an 83.5% likelihood of the Federal Reserve keeping interest rates steady for March. In premarket trading, the SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust and Invesco QQQ Trust ETF traded negatively. Sectors like Tech, Energy, and Communication Services led the market on Tuesday, with Utilities and consumer staples declining. China took retaliatory measures against U.S. tariffs, impacting trade. Notable stock performances included Spotify and Palantir's positive earnings results. Job openings fell, and factory orders also declined. Key index performances include the Nasdaq Composite rising by 1.35% and the Russell 2000 gaining 1.41%. Analysts at BlackRock are analyzing AI developments for investment insights.

(NYSE: SNAP) based in Santa Monica, California has submitted its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2024, to the Securities and Exchange Commission. news.headline: Mondelez Q4: Sales $9.6B (3.1% YoY growth, missed est.), EPS $0.65 (missed est.), Cocoa inflation concerns.
news.summary: Mondelez International Inc, a snacks giant (NASDAQ: MDLZ), experienced a drop in premarket trading. The company's fourth-quarter sales grew by 3.1% year-on-year to $9.60 billion, falling short of the analyst consensus of $9.64 billion. Adjusted EPS of $0.65 also missed estimates of $0.66. In specific regions, revenues in Asia, Middle East, and Africa saw a significant increase of 9.9%, while Latin America plummeted by 7.2%. Meanwhile, revenue from Europe and North America rose by 5.8% and 0.1% respectively. Gross profit for the quarter saw a 6.9% increase to $3.71 billion.

news.headline: Stanley Black & Decker reports 4Q & Full Year 2024 results:- Revenues: $15.4B in 2024, 3% down from prior year- 4Q Revenues: $3.7B flat YoY with 3% organic growth- 4Q Gross Margin: 30.8%, up 120 basis points vs prior year- 4Q Adjusted EPS: $1.49- 4Q Free Cash Flow: $565M- Planned cost savings of $2B by end of 2025 to optimize cost base- 2025 Planning Assumptions: Adjusted EPS $5.25 (+/- $0.50), Free Cash Flow $750M (+/- $100M)
news.summary: Stanley Black & Decker announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024. In 2024, revenues were $15.4 billion, down 3% from the prior year. The fourth quarter revenues were $3.7 billion, flat versus the prior year with 3% organic growth. The fourth quarter gross margin was 30.8%, up 120 basis points versus the prior year. Adjusted gross margin for the quarter was 31.2%. Fourth quarter EPS was $1.28 and adjusted EPS was $1.49. The fourth quarter cash from operating activities was $679 million, and free cash flow was $565 million. The company's Global Cost Reduction Program generated $110 million in pre-tax run-rate cost savings in the fourth quarter and has yielded approximately $1.5 billion in pre-tax run-rate cost savings since its inception. They plan to return adjusted gross margins to historical 35%+ levels. Management detailed its 2025 planning assumptions including EPS and free cash flow expectations. Stanley Black & Decker remains focused on driving organic growth, margin expansion, and cash generation to deliver long-term shareholder returns.

The HTP, aimed at enhancing resiliency and reliability, represents a significant infrastructure investment in the region.

This growth was driven by the ongoing global cost reduction program, which continues to contribute to margin expansion. Additionally, the company demonstrated strong cash generation in the fourth quarter, supporting its capital allocation priorities. These priorities remain centered on creating value for shareholders.

news.headline: Kelley Blue Book announces 2025 Best Buy Award winners after testing numerous vehicles in the US. Podcast released to celebrate winners.
news.summary: A mini-series podcast has been launched to honor Best Buy Award winners and promote the idea of striving to be one's best self. After a comprehensive review of almost all new and revamped vehicles on the market in the US, Kelley Blue Book, a part of Cox Automotive, announced the winners. The podcast aims to celebrate excellence in the automotive industry and inspire self-improvement. The winners were chosen after rigorous evaluations to ensure their quality and value. This initiative highlights the significance of continuous improvement and setting high standards.

This progress highlights DXC's dedication to excellence and customer satisfaction. The improvements made by DXC Technology underscore its focus on delivering quality services and maintaining its reputation as a key player in the technology industry.

news.headline: PAM Health & Baptist Health Care to open 40-bed rehab hospital in Pensacola, Florida at Catalyst HRE's Henderson Health Center.
news.summary: In Enola, Pennsylvania, a new physical medicine and rehabilitation hospital with 40 beds is set to be established by PAM Health and Baptist Health Care. This facility will be situated on the third and fourth levels of the Henderson Health Center within the Baptist Hospital campus, as part of a collaboration with Catalyst HRE. The hospital is scheduled to commence operations to address the growing demand for specialized healthcare services in the area.
